item.title: A VagrantFile for Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana (On Three Different Servers)
item.description: Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana, commonly referred to as ELK or the Elastic Stack, is a set of tools that can, well do a lot of things. It is most famous for its logging and analytics capabilities.
